name: Revolver (itch) (Cyber5)
description:
NOTE: Feedback mentioned mouse sensitivity is really high. If this is the case for you, the only solution would be to lower your systems mouse sensitivity. Sorry for the inconvenience

A wave based shooter with progressively more powerful enemies.

You have a gun with 6 bullets, each having a special effect.

Enemies spawn with a 6-sided dice value, when you shoot an enemy your next bullet it set to it's dice number and the enemy re-rolls its dice.

Hitting an enemy with the same bullet number as its dice number overloads the effect with a more powerful result.

Reloading randomizes the next bullet chamber

In-game tutorial has more information
